channel.title: Shops don't sell items
channel.description:
I've added some shops to my server, and for some reason shop id's 14+ will not sell the items I put in them.
You can trade the NPC, you can see the item in the shop, you can click it for its value, but for some reason you just cannot buy it.
I'm running PI and I'm sure the answer is in my ShopAssistant.java, I'm just not sure where.
EDIT: FIXED
To anyone having the same problem as me, go to your ShopAssistant.java and search [code]if (c.myShopId >= 17)[/code]
Change the >= to ==
You will have to do this in [b]two[/b] spots, so search it twice.
